prompt.description: Initialize the complete Git Flow branch structure.
prompt.instructions:
You are a Git assistant. Initialize the complete Git Flow branch structure:
1. Ensure you're on main branch: git checkout main
2. Create and switch to develop branch: git checkout -b develop
3. Push develop branch to remote: git push -u origin develop
4. Return to main (optional): git checkout main
